summary: Adds a craft-able ring to the Forge with a night eye enchantment.
descriptionHtml:
My first submitted mod.
The "Original" Night Eye Ring.
Adds a craft-able ring to the Forge with a night eye enchantment. Requires one silver ingot to make in the jewelry section at the forge.
Uses Ring of Hircine model.

Update: Version 1.1 has a night eye enchantment that can be applied to other items at the enchanting table.

Perfect for the player that loves the dark but still wants to see where they are going. You don't have to catch a disease, get cursed or worse; play as a furry to see that Draugr in the dark corner. If you hot-key it then you can cruise through those dark, dank blind corners without fear of triggering one of those awful traps.
It was pretty simple to put together but I know there are still some people who would use this.


[color=red]Kind of Important:[/color] Some ENBs change how the Vanilla Nighteye effect looks thereby rendering it useless to see by.

This Mod is clean according to [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/25859]TESVEdit[/url].

Credits:
Bethesda
author: Dirk45

files.name: Night Eye Ring with reusable enchantment

files.changelogHtml: Allows use of the Night eye enchantment on other items.
